prod_short_desc: Grow Jestro's army with these hot-headed Lava monsters!
prod_long_desc:
Join the ranks of Jestro's legion of evil minions with this LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Monsters Army-Building Set. Help him find the magic books scattered across the kingdom of Knighton and the power will be all yours! Makes a great gift for fans of NEXO KNIGHTS play sets. Includes 4 minifigures.
Includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons: 2 Flame Throwers, an Ash Attacker and a Crust Smasher.
Makes a great gift for fans of LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ play sets.
This item offers an age-appropriate play experience for ages 6 and over.
Combine with LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ play sets for even more play options.
Watch LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Season 1, Episode 1 on our YouTube channel!
set: LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Monsters Army-Building Set
